code: import*as actionTypes from"./productActionTypes";import axios from"axios";export var load=function load(){return{type:actionTypes.LOAD};};export var setBrand=function setBrand(brand){return{type:actionTypes.SET_BRAND,brand:brand};};export var setPrices=function setPrices(min,max){return{type:actionTypes.SET_PRICE,max:max,min:min};};export var setSelect=function setSelect(id){return{type:actionTypes.SET_SELECTED,id:id};};export var getItem=function getItem(item){return function(dispatch){dispatch(load());axios.get('/api/Product/'+item).then(function(res){console.log(res.data);dispatch({type:actionTypes.GET_ITEM,data:res.data});}).catch(function(err){console.log(err);});};};
